text: Ntenga ﷺ jwaakunsoomela ma Ȃya ga Allah gakusalichisya, kuti ŵakoposye aŵala ŵaakulupilile ni kutendaga yambone kutyochela m’chipi ni kwajinjisya mwilanguka. Sano jwatankulupilile Allah ni kutendaga yambone takan'jinjisye ku Matimbe ga ku Mbepo gasikujilima cha pasi pakwe sulo, chakaŵe ŵandamo mwalakwemo kwa yaka ni yaka, Allah pamasile pankolochesye jwalakwejo lisiki lyambone nnope
